title: Which is the best interactive whiteboard brand? - Quora

response.answer_text: It's been about three years since I regularly used them. At the time, for me at least, Promethean had much richer classroom software but finicky hardware. Smart's hardware was a doddle to use. I bought Promethean for IT literate teaching staff who would have access to training and a community of practice. Smart for more general use. Anyone could pick up a pen and use its basic features.

I can’t find this called Interactive Whiteboard’s driver. There is no brand on it, or any other information but a broken CD. Does anyone knows what this whiteboard’s brand, or model to download its driver package. Thanks
